remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的常见元素的实现和控件。The class provides implementations of common elements for the and controls. 以下属性是数据绑定的用户的主要关注事项或: ， ， ，并属性。The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound or : , , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是演示如何使用一个完整应用程序， ， ，和的成员类实现了类。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例加载和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户选择某个项的列表框中时，所选的值用于返回与所选的项关联的数据。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种方法来填充和控件。There are two ways to fill the and controls. 例如，您可以将对象添加到通过使用方法。For example, you can add objects to the by using the method. 您还可以添加到对象通过使用， ，和属性来填充。You can also add objects to a by using the , , and properties to fill the . 当属性设置，则用户不能修改的项集合中。When the property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection. 如果设置属性会导致数据源，若要更改，引发事件。If setting the property causes the data source to change, the event is raised. 如果设置此属性会导致数据成员，若要更改，引发事件。If setting this property causes the data member to change, the event is raised. 当您将设置到`null`，设置为空字符串 ("")。When you set to `null`, is set to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是演示如何使用一个完整应用程序， ， ，和的成员类实现了类。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例加载和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户选择某个项的列表框中时，所选的值用于返回与所选的项关联的数据。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`ListControl1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承的控件可以显示不同类型的对象。The controls that inherit from can display diverse types of objects. 如果指定的属性不存在对对象或的值为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果`ToString`改为显示方法。If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead. 如果不能设置新的显示成员，则会保持设置的上一个显示成员。If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是演示如何使用一个完整应用程序， ， ，和的成员类实现了类。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 该示例加载和列表框。The example loads an and the list box. 当用户选择某个项的列表框中时，所选的值用于返回与所选的项关联的数据。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件之前每个可见项，将引发设置的格式。The event is raised before each visible item in the is formatted. 处理此事件，可以访问要通过此列表项，显示的字符串属性的。Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the property of the . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`ListControl1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`会导致事件被引发的每个可见成员。Setting the property to `true` causes the event to be raised for each visible member of the . ，和相关，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果是`false`，将不会设置为-1为空。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果是`true`，将设置为-1 时为空。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在未指定属性，返回的结果`ToString`对象的方法。If a property is not specified in , returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object. ，和相关，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果是`false`，将不会设置为-1为空。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果是`true`，将设置为-1 时为空。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示返回由指定的属性的值属性。The following code example shows the returning the value of the property specified by the property. 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置属性的路径，它将用作 中的项的实际值。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the .

value.span: ，表示 属性值的单个属性名称，或解析为最终数据绑定对象的属性名、单个属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。

The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的内容的在将数据绑定的情况下的属性。Specify the contents of the property in cases where you bind data. 您可以清除属性通过将属性设置为空字符串 ("") 或`null`。You can clear the property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`. 设置一个新属性将引发和事件。Setting a new property raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了将数据加载到和设置到列表中对象的属性。The following code example shows loading the data into an and setting the to a property of the object in the list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`ListControl1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#148)]
